comments: She is a great teacher. If your goal is to know the subject, take her classes. The course is kind of difficult and covers a lot of material, but she makes it easy to understand.

I love Pat! She is a wonderful instructor that will go out of her way for anyone, if they ask her for it! She goes above and beyond the normal instructor. Anatomy is a rough course to take, so nobody can expect it will be a breeze.
If you are a good student you can do well in this class. Ask for help if youneed it. will work to help. Can be hard to understand but helpful if asked. I would take another claas from her.

Not helpful at all!!! Got A\'s in all my other Bio classes, love the subject. I hated every minute of this term with her. She makes no sense, has no idea what she is doing. I dont feel she even knows the material that she is trying to teach. Her tests were not written well, it was hard to userstand what she was even asking for. I do not recommend!!!
